articles.title: Texas Tech suspends Coach Mark Adams for 'racially insensitive comment' - The Washington Post
articles.description: The second-year men's basketball coach said he « was quoting the scripture » when he made the comment to a player.
articles.content:

articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 5 March 2023: Spectacular meeting of Venus and Jupiter - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day is depicting two bright planets in the sky. These are none other than the rare Venus and Jupiter conjunction.
